Text:
The uncropped 2.35 aspect ratio version is here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6489720

Let me know which aspect ratio/dimensions you all prefer. I am interested to know. I have checked this cropped 16x9 encode and it looks great. Everything is larger on my small screen and the left and right side cropping does not seem to make me feel like I am missing anything.

SCREEN THUMBNAILS (comparison)

original 2.35 aspect ratio
http://bayimg.com/kAIkGAaDm

cropped 1.77 (16x9) aspect ratio
http://bayimg.com/kAiKjaAdM

didnt miss any important scenes in the sides 

instead of cropping why dont you try changing the resolution.... 2.35-> 1.77
yeah the people will look alittle tall but no one misses any detail in the movie... you will still have full screen in your device
Having bad a aspect ratio and stretching everything is not something I would ever do. If I download a video like that I delete it immediately. Bad aspect ratios drive me mad. ;-)
Great quality for  a great movie.  Thanks!
Hi k3nd00d, 1st of all thank you for to share this for the psp :-)  But I would like to know if its posible watch the movie without the English Sub,or not?,thank u in advance
Dont worry k3nd00d,I found the answer! :-P  Thank you again for this great movie for psp, Im seeding now :-)
